title: Remember Landline Etiquette? (with Lisa Loeb)
itunes:title: Remember Landline Etiquette? (with Lisa Loeb)
description:
In this episode the Bayers welcome nineties icon and Grammy Award-winning musician Lisa Loeb! We talk (so all the time) about landline phone etiquette from growing up including prank calls and Vanessa's love for calling the numbers on catalogs with a pretend accent. We also get into Lilith Fair and guitar shredding and when Lisa toured with Sarah McLachlan. And don't worry, not only do we talk about Lisa's famous cat eyeglasses and her current line of glasses, but Vanessa does a deep dive into the Betsey Johnson dress Lisa wore in the "Stay" video. Dreams! You've got to listen to this episode even if you only hear what you want to!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In this episode the Bayers welcome nineties icon and Grammy Award-winning musician Lisa Loeb! We talk (so all the time) about landline phone etiquette from growing up including prank calls and Vanessa's love for calling the numbers on catalogs with a pretend accent. We also get into Lilith Fair and guitar shredding and when Lisa toured with Sarah McLachlan. And don't worry, not only do we talk about Lisa's famous cat eyeglasses and her current line of glasses, but Vanessa does a deep dive into the Betsey Johnson dress Lisa wore in the "Stay" video. Dreams! You've got to listen to this episode even if you only hear what you want to!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Yngwie Malmsteen, Lisa Loeb, nostalgia, SNL, Berkeley, UC Berkeley, Guitar, Music History, Music Technique, Shredding, glasses, Sarah Mclaughlan, Lilith Fair, Prank Calls, music videos, 90's music videos
